main event: A bright silver object, shaped like a star, was observed spinning in the sky and disappeared instantaneously.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on 14 August 1958 and lasted for about 10 minutes., The object was noted to be bright silver in color and star-shaped., It was observed by a group that included a housewife from Amagansett, Long Island., The observation was made using binoculars from the ground., The object was seen moving from south to north before disappearing.
witness description: housewife from Amagansett, Long Island, NY
